channel.title: Enumeration on Xyniath
channel.description: Recent content in Enumeration on Xyniath

item.title: Cache
item.description: Introduction IP: 10.10.10.172 Difficulty: Easy This is my write-up for the Hack the Box machine Cache. Initial nmap Scan Running the inital nmap scan: nmap -sV -sC -p- -oN nmap 10.10.10.188 Yielded the following results: From these results, it shows that there are two ports open Port 80 apache web server Enumerating the Web Server Navigating to the web server, I am presented with this webpage I navigate through the webpage to try find some useful information

item.title: Monteverde
item.description: Introduction IP: 10.10.10.172 Difficulty: Easy This is my write-up for the Hack the Box machine Monteverde. Initial nmap Scan Running the inital nmap scan: nmap -sV -sC -p- -oN nmap 10.10.10.172 Yielded the following results: From here, you can see that there are 18 open ports and that the windows is running on windows. Ports That Stand Out Port 389 - shows that there's an Active Directory domain named MEGABANK present on the system which may become useful later.
